attributes.additional_details: I think we should have our phones because there are many educational apps and students can access their timetable and homework on their phones. I don’t think that this law is very fair at all.
attributes.background: Allow students to bring their phones to school.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Pass a law that schools cannot prohibit the use of personal devices
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/735449
